function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Supply chains restructuring and nearshoring may lead to smaller headcounts and vulnerable workforces in emerging economies.","Impact":"Job losses and economic vulnerability for workers in emerging economies.","Mitigation":"Investment in skill development and support for transitioning to new industries.","Technologies":"Training and education programs, economic development initiatives.","People":"Workers in emerging economies.","Owner":"Governments, NGOs, and international organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of domestic supply chain for critical medical supplies like ventilators.","Impact":"Inability to rapidly respond to health crises and shortages of life-saving equipment.","Mitigation":"Investment in domestic manufacturing capacity and stockpiling of critical supplies.","Technologies":"Advanced manufacturing technologies like 3D printing, automation, and robotics.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and the public.","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations, and manufacturers."},{"Description":"National self-sufficiency and local manufacturing as a response to global crises.","Impact":"Disruption to international trade and potential environmental benefits.","Mitigation":"Balanced approach to international and local manufacturing, environmental impact assessments.","Technologies":"Sustainable manufacturing practices, energy-efficient production methods, and supply chain optimization.","People":"Global and local communities, workers in manufacturing industries.","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental organizations, and policymakers."}]}
